definition: A recreational activity involving spending time outdoors, typically in a natural environment, where individuals or groups temporarily set up shelter, such as tents or recreational vehicles, to stay overnight. It often refers to a planned excursion or trip focused on camping, allowing people to enjoy nature, engage in outdoor activities, and temporarily disconnect from urban settings.

examples.german: Wir machen einen Campingausflug in den Schwarzwald.
examples.english: We are going on a camping trip to the Black Forest.
The camping trip was very relaxing.

examples.german: Meine Familie plant einen Campingausflug ans Meer.
examples.english: My family is planning a camping trip to the seaside.

examples.german: Wir haben unseren Campingausflug im Nationalpark verbracht.
examples.english: We spent our camping trip in the national park.

examples.german: Der Campingausflug war ein tolles Abenteuer.
examples.english: The camping trip was a great adventure.
